title: BlackBoss_
author: BlackBoss_
created_time: December 29, 2022, 01:36:26 AMLast edit: December 29, 2022, 01:47:03 AM by BlackBoss_
content: Website: casebitcoin.comNew to Bitcoin: Resource for newbieCharts: casebitcoin.com/chartsThat website has some useful tables, charts and educational resources for newbies to learn about Bitcoin.ROI chartBitcoin Price - Doubling time chartBitcoin data tablesMore tables and charts, please explore them on that website.Bitcoin statsWith this table, I really like two stats for BTC inflation rate (next 1 year) and % Supply Issued.Next year, the inflation rate is 1.75% and currently the % Supply Issued is 90.03%Bitcoin Price Closing History by LevelAbove the price at $16,558, there are 758 days in history which account for 14.84% % of Bitcoin's LifeBitcoin Price and ROI on this DateOn 29 December 2022, the ROI on this date is -65% compared to its price one year ago.What does -65% mean?Bitcoin is not too far from its bottom in this 2022 - 2023 bear market. Historically Bitcoin usually is corrected roughly -80% in past bear markets.ROI chartsI made screenshot from 10-year to 1-year charts.The longer time you hold bitcoins, the better ROI you will get. If you look at 5-year, 10-year, no other investment can compare with Bitcoin.Bitcoin Price - Doubling timeIn the past Bitcoin has many events that it doubled its price after several days. This chart is good to warn gamblers with leverages to short Bitcoin, that they can be killed and liquidated after a few days if they short around Bitcoin doubling price times.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Nice site, but OP, you may not have searched. This site is already listed by 1miau in his thread.But you gave a good overview, and you may also find information about other sources useful.List of interesting Bitcoin statistics
